text: Treatment of plexiform fibrohistiocytic tumor may include the following:               -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.                    Peripheral Nervous System Tumors       Ectomesenchymoma     Treatment of ectomesenchymoma may include the following:               -  Surgery and chemotherapy.       -  Radiation therapy.
